answerText: Higgs Boson [or Higgs Particle][10] The Higgs Mechanism is noted for giving this quality to particles through Nambu-Goldstone Bosons. The Compton Wavelength relates a quantum form of this quality .
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | 8 | 7 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: In late 2011, spikes in the 125 GeV[Giga-Electron Volt] region of the ATLAS and CMS experiments was taken as early indicators that this particle may have been observed. For 10 points each: [10] Name this "God particle" whose namesake mechanism is supposed to cause spontaneous symmetry breaking. The discovery of this last unobserved part of the Standard Model is one of the main purposes of the LHC.
